Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! Product Description: Features: 1. Cool that you can see the gears in the back and hear them clicking and pull it out of your pocket to check the time. 2. The hinges that connect the two outer pieces to the center piece feel solid and have little wiggle to them and the hinges hold firm when not unlocked. 3. The silver color of the metal fits quite nicely with the silver face of the front lens and really makes it pop out. 4. The embossed designs on the outer pieces look nice and the roman numerals on the outside of the front piece is a nice little touch, allows you to tell the time both when the watch is opened and closed. Materials: 1. Silver chrome finish and alloy chain 2. High Hardness and Transparency Rubber Dial Window Instructions: Open The Watch: The cover springs open when you push the button in the middle of the winding/set wheel, and snaps securely closed with a firm push. Setting Time: Pull up the crown from the base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until it reaches the exact time. Wind The Watch: Press the crown back into the base of the watch and rotate clockwise 15 - 20 times. Have to wind regularly daily per 24 hours. Please do not over wind up the watch if you feel the crown is getting tight. Over Winding will ultimately break the spring. Warning: If there is a film on the dial window, then please tear off before use, otherwise the film would adsorb the cover and cannot open eventually. Measurements: Case Diameter: approx. 4.7 cm Case Thickness: approx. 1.8 cm (cover included) Chain Length: approx. 37.5 cm (hook included) Watch Weight: approx. 69 g Package Included: 1 x Pocket Watch 1 x Chain 1 x Gift Box - Vintage Mechanical Pocket Watch With Two Openable Covers; Cool For Steampunk Costume - Winding Watch, Not Battery Operated, Very Authentic; Looks Very Stylish, Keeps Good Time - White Dial With Blue Roman Numerals; The Blue is Balanced Well Giving it an Elegant Look - Fantastic Looking Watch; Can be Worn with a lot of Different Outfits; Perfect Gift for Family or Friends or Lovers - Measurements: Case Diameter: 4.7cm; Case Thickness: 1.8cm; Chain Length: 37.5 cm WOLFTEETH Vintage Steampunk Designed Mechanical Pocket Watch Blue Roman Numerals
